block.p: Yasmin Namini, senior vice president for circulation at the New York Times Media Group, has been promoted to senior vice president for marketing and circulation.

Ms. Namini, 47, will be responsible for marketing The Times's brand in print, online and on mobile devices as well as overseeing circulation and distribution of print and electronic versions of The Times. She will report to Scott H. Heekin-Canedy, president and general manager of The Times, and Vivian Schiller, senior vice president and general manager of nytimes.com.

Yasmin Namini, senior vice president for circulation at the New York Times Media Group, has been promoted to senior vice president for marketing and circulation.

Ms. Namini, 47, will be responsible for marketing The Times's brand in print, online and on mobile devices as well as overseeing circulation and distribution of print and electronic versions of The Times. She will report to Scott H. Heekin-Canedy, president and general manager of The Times, and Vivian Schiller, senior vice president and general manager of nytimes.com.

Ms. Namini was named senior vice president for circulation in 2006. In 2005, she was appointed chief customer officer for the New England Media Group. Before that, she served as senior vice president for consumer marketing at the New England Newspaper Group and had earlier been senior vice president for circulation at The Boston Globe. She also served as vice president for circulation marketing at The Times.

Alyse Myers, currently senior vice president and chief marketing officer, is taking on a new role as vice president for brand programs. She will focus on expanding the company's event business and will continue to work on identifying strategic partnerships and programs.
